scenes.description: MC section after the performance, announcing new merchandise.

subtitles.original: ...いますように
subtitles.english: ...I hope.

subtitles.original: 手を叩こう
subtitles.english: Let's clap our hands

subtitles.original: 手を叩こう
subtitles.english: Let's clap our hands

subtitles.original: 光差す
subtitles.english: Where the light shines

subtitles.original: 僕たちの未来
subtitles.english: Upon our future

subtitles.original:
Breaking Dimensions
Lyrics: Steph Music: Carlos Okabe, Masaki Tomiyama
Arrangement: Masaki Tomiyama
subtitles.english:
Breaking Dimensions
Lyrics: Steph Music: Carlos Okabe, Masaki Tomiyama
Arrangement: Masaki Tomiyama

subtitles.original: Just, sis, just like that
subtitles.english: Just, sis, just like that

subtitles.original: Just, sis, get, get the!
subtitles.english: Just, sis, get, get the!

subtitles.original: Look at the horizon together as one
subtitles.english: Look at the horizon together as one

subtitles.original: A star is on the rise and it's only begun
subtitles.english: A star is on the rise and it's only begun

subtitles.original: Capture the moment that we're clamoring for
subtitles.english: Capture the moment that we're clamoring for

subtitles.original: An infinite future's right out the door
subtitles.english: An infinite future's right out the door

subtitles.original:
It's a timeless story with a new feel
Not just algorithm, it's real
subtitles.english:
It's a timeless story with a new feel
Not just algorithm, it's real

subtitles.original:
Wake up, big dreams about to come true
That means it's time to break through
subtitles.english:
Wake up, big dreams about to come true
That means it's time to break through

subtitles.original:
Never knew we could make it so far
Always striving, thriving, higher
subtitles.english:
Never knew we could make it so far
Always striving, thriving, higher

subtitles.original:
Achieving the impossible
We're virtually unstoppable
subtitles.english:
Achieving the impossible
We're virtually unstoppable

subtitles.original: Because through it all we just keep moving
subtitles.english: Because through it all we just keep moving

subtitles.original: Now everybody sing
subtitles.english: Now everybody sing

subtitles.original: We're making our way to the next dimension
subtitles.english: We're making our way to the next dimension

subtitles.original: We'll reinvent the world that we live in
subtitles.english: We'll reinvent the world that we live in

subtitles.original: We'll greet every day with good intention
subtitles.english: We'll greet every day with good intention

subtitles.original: Break conventions, run right through
subtitles.english: Break conventions, run right through

subtitles.original: We're smashing barriers left and right
subtitles.english: We're smashing barriers left and right

subtitles.original: Soar past the other ways, stay in flight
subtitles.english: Soar past the other ways, stay in flight

subtitles.original: So get together let's reunite
subtitles.english: So get together let's reunite

subtitles.original: Reach out, reach out the future's bright
subtitles.english: Reach out, reach out the future's bright

subtitles.original: Even though together for it feels like eternity
subtitles.english: Even though together for it feels like eternity

subtitles.original: The times are changing but we're ready for infinity
subtitles.english: The times are changing but we're ready for infinity

subtitles.original: As far as I think I could go, far with me combined
subtitles.english: As far as I think I could go, far with me combined

subtitles.original: So look at the horizon and then look beyond
subtitles.english: So look at the horizon and then look beyond

subtitles.original: We'll marvel at the sky and the strength of our bond
subtitles.english: We'll marvel at the sky and the strength of our bond

subtitles.original: We're making a vow to the smiling stars
subtitles.english: We're making a vow to the smiling stars

subtitles.original: A powerful moment that's all of ours
subtitles.english: A powerful moment that's all of ours

subtitles.original: The seasons change but we keep shining
subtitles.english: The seasons change but we keep shining

subtitles.original: Now everybody sing
subtitles.english: Now everybody sing

subtitles.original: Keep it going!
subtitles.english: Keep it going!

subtitles.original: We're making our way to the next dimension
subtitles.english: We're making our way to the next dimension

subtitles.original: A million flows in every direction
subtitles.english: A million flows in every direction

subtitles.original: We'll give every mile our full attention
subtitles.english: We'll give every mile our full attention

subtitles.original: Breaking tension, breaking through
subtitles.english: Breaking tension, breaking through

subtitles.original: With endless energy, strong attire
subtitles.english: With endless energy, strong attire

subtitles.original: A perfect harmony, reach even higher
subtitles.english: A perfect harmony, reach even higher

subtitles.original: So clap along with me, time to rise
subtitles.english: So clap along with me, time to rise

subtitles.original: The future's bright before our eyes
subtitles.english: The future's bright before our eyes

subtitles.original: A new dimension of freedom that we've found
subtitles.english: A new dimension of freedom that we've found

subtitles.original: Yeah, we've made it
subtitles.english: Yeah, we've made it

subtitles.original: We're breaking out of the monochrome bound
subtitles.english: We're breaking out of the monochrome bound

subtitles.original: We're unlimited
subtitles.english: We're unlimited

subtitles.original: We're gonna spring to life and break the chains
subtitles.english: We're gonna spring to life and break the chains

subtitles.original: Turn up the hype, can't be contained
subtitles.english: Turn up the hype, can't be contained

subtitles.original: We're shaking up the status quo
subtitles.english: We're shaking up the status quo

subtitles.original: No time to stop, we're good to go
subtitles.english: No time to stop, we're good to go

subtitles.original: The whole wide world is listening
subtitles.english: The whole wide world is listening

subtitles.original: So everybody sing!
subtitles.english: So everybody sing!

subtitles.original: We're making our way to the next dimension
subtitles.english: We're making our way to the next dimension

subtitles.original: We're living out the dreams we've believed in
subtitles.english: We're living out the dreams we've believed in

subtitles.original: Excitement beyond our comprehension
subtitles.english: Excitement beyond our comprehension

subtitles.original: There's no question, we'll break through
subtitles.english: There's no question, we'll break through

subtitles.original: For deep aspiring to excel
subtitles.english: For deep aspiring to excel

subtitles.original: It's awe-inspiring, going well
subtitles.english: It's awe-inspiring, going well

subtitles.original: So light the fire and let's rebel
subtitles.english: So light the fire and let's rebel

subtitles.original: The future's bright as we can tell
subtitles.english: The future's bright as we can tell

subtitles.original: Breaking Dimensions
subtitles.english: Breaking Dimensions

subtitles.original: Yeah!
subtitles.english: Yeah!

subtitles.original: And that's amazing job today!
subtitles.english: And that's amazing job today!

subtitles.original: You’ve conquered all the trials and performed at full force!
subtitles.english: You’ve conquered all the trials and performed at full force!

subtitles.original: Yeah!
subtitles.english: Yeah!

subtitles.original: And what’s more, for the 3D!
subtitles.english: And what’s more, for the 3D!

subtitles.original: Justice! Just, sis! Just like that!
subtitles.english: Justice! Just, sis! Just like that!

subtitles.original: Just, sis! Get, get the!
subtitles.english: Just, sis! Get, get the!

subtitles.original: Yeah!
subtitles.english: Yeah!

subtitles.original: But we’re not done yet! We have not one, but two big announcements! Yeah!
subtitles.english: But we’re not done yet! We have not one, but two big announcements! Yeah!

subtitles.original: First up, drumroll please...
subtitles.english: First up, drumroll please...

subtitles.original: Introducing the official Justice 3D Showcase Celebration merch!
subtitles.english: Introducing the official Justice 3D Showcase Celebration merch!

subtitles.original: Alright everyone, get into your merch positions!
subtitles.english: Alright everyone, get into your merch positions!

subtitles.original: Oh, merch positions, right!
subtitles.english: Oh, merch positions, right!

subtitles.original: Okay! First we have Sergeant Smokey’s design multi-case!
subtitles.english: Okay! First we have Sergeant Smokey’s design multi-case!

subtitles.original: There it is! Here!
subtitles.english: There it is! Here!

subtitles.original: It’s a multi-case!
subtitles.english: It’s a multi-case!

subtitles.original: And if you also want to be Sergeant Smokey and boss us around...
subtitles.english: And if you also want to be Sergeant Smokey and boss us around...

subtitles.original:
Sergeant Smokey
Multi Case
subtitles.english:
Sergeant Smokey
Multi Case
